CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Verdant Ward relative to District Alpha?
SRP.A: Verdant Ward is {below} District Alpha in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing District Alpha relative to Outer Rim Settlements?
SRP.A: District Alpha is {above} Outer Rim Settlements in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Outer Rim Settlements relative to District Alpha?
SRP.A: Outer Rim Settlements is {below} District Alpha in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total life expectancy?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {District Alpha}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total life expectancy?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Quarter}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is District Alpha's minimum Life Expectancy in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: District Alpha's minimum Life Expectancy is in {1997}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Outer Rim Settlements's minimum Life Expectancy in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Outer Rim Settlements's minimum Life Expectancy is in {1997}.

NC.Q: Was the total Life Expectancy in 2011 higher or lower than in 2013?
NC.A: The total life expectancy in 2011 was {lower} than in 2013.

NC.Q: Was the total Life Expectancy in 2007 higher or lower than in 2016?
NC.A: The total life expectancy in 2007 was {lower} than in 2016.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2005, did the total Life Expectancy experience a larger or smaller change than between 2006 and 2016?
NC.A: The change in total life expectancy between 1999 and 2005 was {smaller} than between 2006 and 2016.

NC.Q: Between 2001 and 2012, was the average total Life Expectancy higher or lower than between 2013 and 2014?
NC.A: The average total life expectancy between 2001 and 2012 was {lower} than between 2013 and 2014.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {District Alpha} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Outer Rim Settlements and Stellar City Core first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Outer Rim Settlements and Stellar City Core first exchanged leading positions in {1998}.
